name: pytest-django
raw_recipe:
{% set version = "3.1.1" %}

package:
  name: pytest-django
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  fn: pytest-django-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  url:  https://pypi.io/packages/source/p/pytest-django/pytest-django-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: eb0d79d24ab2c0064c2d956603b77041508e25e6da50e92136ae1050d022ceaf

build:
  number: 0
  preserve_egg_dir: True
  script: python setup.py install --single-version-externally-managed --record record.txt
  entry_points:
    - pytest11 = django:pytest_django.plugin

requirements:
  build:
    - python
    - setuptools
    - setuptools_scm 1.11.1
  run:
    - python
    - pytest >=2.9

test:
  imports:
    - pytest_django

about:
  home: http://pytest-django.readthedocs.org/
  license: BSD 3-Clause
  summary: 'A Django plugin for py.test.'

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - kwilcox
    - ocefpaf
